description:
Ichigo asks Rinne to banish "Kokkuri-san". Sabato tries to offload a cursed piggy bank. Later, Sansei makes another attempt to fight his fear of spirits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kokkuri-san / Cursed Piggy Bank / The Hated Sansei
Kokkuri-san – La tirelire maudite – Sanse le mal-aimé
こっくりさん / 呪金箱 / 嫌われた三世
